title: recipes_Brookville_Hotel_Sweet_and_Sour_Coleslaw
text:
Title: Brookville Hotel Sweet and Sour Coleslaw.
.
Description: An easy, 5-ingredient recipe for coleslaw from a famous Kansas restaurant doesn't need mayonnaise. Make the slaw ahead of time and let it chill for several hours before serving. It's great for a potluck..
.
Ingredients:.
- 1 cup heavy whipping cream.
- 0.66666668653488 cup white sugar.
- 0.33333334326744 cup distilled white vinegar.
- 1 teaspoon salt.
- 1.5 pounds shredded cabbage.
.
Instructions:.
- Stir cream, sugar, vinegar, and salt together in a bowl until sugar and salt have dissolved; cover and refrigerate dressing for 30 minutes to blend flavors. Pour dressing over cabbage in a bowl, toss to combine, and refrigerate until thoroughly chilled, at least 2 hours..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 252 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 30 g.
cholesterolContent: 54 mg.
fiberContent: 3 g.
proteinContent: 2 g.
saturatedFatContent: 9 g.
sodiumContent: 423 mg.
sugarContent: 26 g.
fatContent: 15 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 6 servings.
